author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Lively Ladies open ‘Collage’
text:
Lively Ladies open ‘Collage’ Oct 21, 2015 "Our beautiful world" by Audrey McGlashan is one of the original art works in the fall Lively Ladies show in Rockland. 
Rockland — The Lively Ladies will open their next group show, “Collage,” with a reception Wednesday, Oct. 28, from 5:30 to 7 p.m. in the Garage Gallery of Eastern Tire and Auto Service Inc., 70 Park St. The public is invited to attend, and light refreshments will be served. 
Exhibiting are Midcoast artists Stell Shevis, Lois Anne, Rebecca Thompson, Lauralee Clayton, Edith LaRoche, Deborah Winship and Audrey McGlashan. The gallery is open weekdays, except holidays. For hours or location information, call 594-5250. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
